ygData.subject: Re: NURF
ygData.msgSnippet: True besides You can still Kite you just have to reverse kite fear ala 3 dot.  This way gives the monster a chance.  Hehe ... From: Trizzen Do Trevan
ygData.messageBody:
True besides You can still Kite you just have to reverse kite fear ala 3
dot. This way gives the monster a chance. Hehe
-----Original Message-----
From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, September 14, 1999 6:39 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] NURF


>From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>
>I acutally like it as well.
>
>The reasoning behind that is that I almost exclusively group. I rarely
>solo, and when I do, it does not involve kiting. So the patch actually
>helps my style of play quite a bit. Since I also have a pure warrior, I
>can see where the game is unbalanced that a necro can take down red
>creatures with virtually no risk to themselves, while my warrior
>struggles and occasionally dies from yellow.
>Of course, I was in the Karanas last night and was the /ooc channel
>spammed by people bitching about losing their kiting abilities.
>
>Darkmoon 15th circle nercomancer
>
>--- Fraal <mata_eq@...> wrote:
>> So no one had anything to say about the DOT nurf?
>> I thought I would see tons of email. Maybe everyone
>> is playing since the servers were down for so
>> stinking long.
>>
>> Anyway I like the way they did the DOT nurf, I
>> usually finght in a group so it HELPED me cus DAM
>> was increased if they run less then 18 seconds. :-)
>>
>> I guess we shall see if this nurfs Kiteing . . .
>>
>> -Fraal L19 Ogre Shaman
>> -Skel L22 Necro
>> -E'ci
>>
>> (I have a vested interest in DOT's)
>>
>> P.S. (L19 SHM spells are sweet!)
>>
>>
>
